TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void MAPIFolderEvents_12_BeforeFolderMoveEventHandler(MAPIFolder MoveTo, out bool Cancel);
.class public auto ansi sealed MAPIFolderEvents_12_BeforeFolderMoveEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub MAPIFolderEvents_12_BeforeFolderMoveEventHandler(MoveTo As MAPIFolder, ByRef Cancel As Boolean)
public delegate void MAPIFolderEvents_12_BeforeFolderMoveEventHandler(MAPIFolder ^ MoveTo, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % Cancel);

param.name: MoveTo
param.span: 代表要向其移动项目的文件夹。

span.span: Represents the folder to which the item is being moved.

param.name: Cancel
param.span: 设置为 True 可取消移动或删除操作。

span.span: Set this to True to cancel the move or delete action.

summary.span: 这是针对相应对象中的事件的委派。在对事件实现回调方法后，使用此委派将回调方法连接到该事件。如果存在多个版本的事件接口，此委派将为指定版本的 Outlook 中的事件连接回调方法。

span.span: This is a delegate for an event in the corresponding object. After implementing a callback method for the event, use this delegate to connect the callback method to the event. If there are multiple versions of the event interface, this delegate connects the callback method for the event in the specified version of Outlook.
